General.Name: Sono Group NV
General.Description: Sono Motors N.V. operates as a solar mobility solutions provider. The company, through its proprietary solar technology, integrates solar panels into a vehicle's bodywork, using energy captured from the sun to charge the vehicle's battery. It focuses on the design and development of its first solar electric vehicle, the Sion. The company is also focuses on integrating its solar technology into various vehicle architectures, including buses, trucks, trailers, and others. Sono Motors N.V. was founded in 2012 and is headquartered in Munich, Germany.
